beforeBalanceUpdate(address,address).details: This function checkpoints two users rewards. This part of code can not be implemented in the Silo     because of the smart contract bytecode limit. Can be called from the Silo only.

params._firstToCheckpoint: address to checkpoint, can be zero.
params._secondToCheckpoint: address to checkpoint, can be zero.

wrapperSetupVerification(address).details: This function checks ConvexSiloWrapper `_wrapper`. Returns false if `_wrapper` is not registered in     `ConvexSiloWrapperFactory`. Returns false if Curve pool can not be fetched for `_wrapper` underlying     Curve LP token. Otherwise, returns true.

returns._0: If the return argument is false, Silo contract must revert.

cachedSiloWrappers.details: silo => wrapper cached data of Silo assets to reduce external calls.

devdoc.title: SiloConvexStateChangesHandler is used in `SiloConvex` for checkpoints for users rewards.     This part of code can not be implemented in Silo code because of the smart contract bytecode limit.
